summary: Realtime chat lobby application with rooms displaying live user counts, view counts, and activity timestamps (updated by messages and reactions)
architectural_notes: Lobby rooms sorted algorithmically: live rooms first, then by most recent activity (messages or replies), view count as tiebreaker
Room activity tracking includes both messages and reactions for timestamp updates

existing_features.title: Update the lobby card UI to display the last modified timestamp (most recent message or reaction activity) instead of the current timestamp

new_feature_requests.summary: Update lobby card timestamp to show last modified time (new message or new reaction)
Update the backend Chatroom type to track the most recent activity time from either new messages or new reactions, and expose this timestamp for lobby sorting

projectName: Update lobby card timestamp to track message and reaction activity
